grails.converters.deep
[Java] Class JSON

@Deprecated
public class JSON
extends JSON

A converter that converts domain classes, Maps, Lists, Arrays, POJOs and POGOs to JSON (Including nested Domain Classes)

deprecated:
The Converters framework has been refactored and this made the deep Converters obsolete
Authors:
Siegfried Puchbauer
